m_szDocSumamry: Wheels Hyundai ix35 Fuel Cell: car review It runs on hydrogen and emits nothing but a dribble of water. Could Hyundai’s ix35 Fuel Cell be the car of the future? Clean and serene: the Hyundai ix35 Fuel Cell is smooth and easy to drive 0-62mph: 12.5 seconds Fuel economy: 0.95kg of hydrogen per 369 miles (equivalent to about 60mpg) Hydrogen-powered cars are like buses. You wait years and years and then two come along at once: Hyundai’s ix35 Fuel Cell and Toyota’s Mirai .
